text: The Town of Lunenburg was incorporated in 1888. There have been 19 mayors of the town as of 2020.Mayors of Lunenburg Explore Lunenburg ==Mayors== *Augustus J. Wolff 1888-1891 *S. Watson Oxner 1891-1895 *Augustus J. Wolff 1895-1899 *Daniel J. Rudolf 1899-1902 *Allan R. Moreash 1902-1910 *Augustus J. Wolff 1910-1911 *John James Kinley 1911-1914 *J. Frank Hall 1914-1916 *William Duff 1916-1922 *Arthur W. Schwartz 1922-1930 *Wallace E. Knock 1930-1934 *Arthur W. Schwartz 1934-1946 *L.L. Hebb 1946-1948 *Douglas F. Adams 1948-1952 *F. Homer Zwicker 1952-1956 *Roy M. Whynacht 1956-1958 *R.G.A. Wood 1958-1971 *Sherman Zwicker 1971-1979 *Laurence Mawhinney 1979-2012Former Lunenburg Mayor Honoured South Shore Breaker *Rachel Bailey 2012–2020Bailey first female mayor of Lunenburg Halifax Chronicle Herald *Matt Riser 2020-present ==References== Lunenburg Category:Lunenburg County, Nova Scotia
title: List of mayors of Lunenburg, Nova Scotia
